means: 保证的，确信的，给人信心的
使相信，使确信( assure的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Empowering the underprivileged lies in assuring them that education holds the real source of power.
sentence.Network_cn: 帮助贫困人民就要让他们相信教育是真正的力量源泉。

sentence.Network_en: He spent the whole evening assuring his mother of his love and devotion.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用了整整一个晚上向母亲表达孝心.

sentence.Network_en: A plea bargain was offered by the state assuring her that she would not go to prison.
sentence.Network_cn: 州方提出了一份认罪辩诉协议，保证她不会入狱。

Is Responsible for planning , supervising and assuring the daily operation affairs ;, 负责规划 , 监督和保证分公司日常运作事务;

list.abs: 新东方六级高频词汇整理_百度文库 ... array n. 陈列，一系列 assurance n. 保证 blame n. 责任.

资产配置与投资时钟的应用 ... 技术服务业 Support Services 人寿保险 Life Assurance 休闲与酒店业 Leisure & Hotels.
放心英文怎么说_百度知道 ... take it easy 放轻松,别紧张 rest assured 放心；确信无疑 rest one's heart 叫某人放心！.

entry.def: If you assure someone that something is true or will happen, you tell them that it is definitely true or will definitely happen, often in order to make them less worried.

example.ex: He hastened to assure me that there was nothing traumatic to report...
example.tran: 他忙不迭地向我保证，并没有什么悲惨的事要诉说。

example.ex: 'Are you sure the raft is safe?' she asked anxiously. 'Couldn't be safer,' Max assured her confidently...
example.tran: “你确定木筏安全吗？”她不安地问道。“再安全不过了，”马克斯信心十足地向她保证道。

entry.def: To assure someone of something means to make certain that they will get it.

example.ex: Last night's resounding victory over Birmingham City has virtually assured them of promotion...
example.tran: 昨晚大胜伯明翰城队实际上已确保他们能够晋级。

example.ex: Ways must be found to assure our children a decent start in life.
example.tran: 必须想办法保证我们的孩子有一个不错的人生开端。

entry.tran: 我可以向你保证；相信我
entry.def: You use phrases such as I can assure you or let me assure you to emphasize the truth of what you are saying.

example.ex: I can assure you that the animals are well cared for...
example.tran: 我可以向你保证动物们得到了精心照顾。

example.ex: This may sound trivial, but I assure you it is quite important!...
example.tran: 这听上去也许微不足道，但是，相信我，它十分重要！

auth_sentence.content: The government has been assuring investors that those reforms will come.
auth_sentence.res_content: The government has been assuring investors that those reforms will come.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The government has been assuring investors that those reforms will come.

auth_sentence.content: Our armed forces are always assuring us that they will protect us.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our armed forces are always assuring us that they will protect us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our armed forces are always assuring us that they will protect us.

auth_sentence.content: If you find this re-assuring continue down a path of rigid determinism.
auth_sentence.res_content: If you find this re-assuring continue down a path of rigid determinism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If you find this re-assuring continue down a path of rigid determinism.
